text: Kerstin Lillemor Ekman (née Hjorth; born 27 August 1933) is a Swedish novelist. She was born in Risinge, Finspång, Östergötland County. She is known for her 1993 mystery novel Blackwater. Ekman was elected member of the Swedish Academy in 1978, but left the Academy in 1989. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish writers
title: Kerstin Ekman
